amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 99, 101, 102, 103, 104, 115, 118, 119, 120, 121, 123, 124, 128, 136, 145, and 155 printed in part A of House Report 113-460. See page D545 of the Congressional Record for May 21, 2014, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 6 consisting of amendments numbered 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 99, 101, 102, 103, 104, 115, 118, 119, 120, 121, 123, 124, 128, 136, 145, and 155 printed in Part A of House Report 113-460.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A024) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
